name: Emon Roy Bappy
headline: Research and Development Engineer at Cybernetics Hi-Tech Solutions
summary: My background in Mechanical Engineering from Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology has accelerated my passion for electromechanical systems. I have a strong foundation in Military Robotics and Bio‑Inspired Soft Robotics with extensive experience in computer‑aided design, printed circuit board design, finite element analysis, fused deposition modeling, molding, composite manufacturing, and CNC manufacturing processes. Currently, I am passionately pursuing opportunities to advance soft robotics in healthcare applications.

projects.title: Bio-Inspired Soft Robotics
projects.description: Developed prototypes of soft robotic systems inspired by biological organisms for potential use in healthcare applications.
